W06_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W06_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a twisty, squirmy world on the other side of the door. What kind of spirits could possibly be in a place like this?

W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KA_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KA_100_DETAIL.text: Rumors claim the Cognitheon houses a fire spirit.

W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_100_DETAIL.text: Rumors claim the Respiquary houses a water spirit.

W06_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W06_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Time to return to the Heavens.

W06_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W06_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Time to head back to the Heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.
